## Description {#details}

### make() {#af0cf2e45248094d2e024dc4ce6917fdc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Interval&lt; MemDGNode &gt; llvm::sandboxir::MemDGNodeIntervalBuilder::make (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/interval">Interval</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &gt; &amp; Instrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> &amp; DAG)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given <code>Instrs</code> it finds their closest mem nodes in the interval and returns the corresponding mem range.

Note: BotN (or its neighboring mem node) is included in the range.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h/#l00301">301</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h">DependencyGraph.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-cpp/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-cpp">DependencyGraph.cpp</a>.
